description.plain:
Manchester-born singer-songwriter Pip Millett has taken the UK by storm with her chilled, emotional fusion of R&B and soul.

Her love affair with music began during her school days when she received guitar lessons as a present from her mum, before moving to London to study music.

Pip’s early releases including ‘Make Me Cry’ and ‘Talk About It’ have earned her many fans, including contemporaries like Jorja Smith.

She released her Motion Sick EP in August 2021.
